trans-unit.target: 撒拉守念使

trans-unit.resname: MOM·21 | Serra Faithkeeper | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance
trans-unit.target: 飞行，警戒

trans-unit.resname: MOM·21 | Serra Faithkeeper | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I was there when Phyrexia doomed Serra's realm with a single touch. I was there when Yawgmoth tried and failed to conquer Dominaria. And I will still be here when Elesh Norn lies dead."
trans-unit.target: 「我曾亲眼见证非瑞克西亚轻轻一触即葬送撒拉圣域。我也曾亲眼见证约格莫夫企图征服多明纳里亚而最终落败。我也一定能亲眼见证艾蕾侬殒命当场。」

trans-unit.resname: MOM·22 | Invasion of Gobakhan | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Invasion of Gobakhan

trans-unit.resname: MOM·22 | Invasion of Gobakhan | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) When Invasion of Gobakhan enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand. You may exile a nonland card from it. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may play it. A spell cast this way costs {2} more to cast.
trans-unit.target: (于围攻进战场时，选择一位对手来防卫之。你和其他牌手能攻击围攻。当围攻失守时，将它放逐，然后你施放已转化的此牌。） 当进军高巴汗进战场时，检视目标对手的手牌。你可以放逐其中一张非地牌。于该牌持续放逐的时段内，其拥有者可以使用之。以此法施放的咒语增加{2}来施放。

trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，在每个本回合中攻击过的生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。 牺牲光盾阵列：由你操控的生物获得辟邪与不灭异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·22 | Lightshield Array | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The weight of Phyrexia crashed down upon Gobakhan, but the will of its people endured.
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚之重全数倾注于高巴汗，但其人民意志承负巨压屹立不摇。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·23 | Ephara, Ever-Sheltering | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Ephara, Ever-Sheltering has lifelink and indestructible as long as you control at least three other enchantments. Whenever another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控至少三个其他结界，尽责庇护厄芳拉便具有系命与不灭异能。 每当另一个结界在你的操控下进战场时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·23 | Ephara, Ever-Sheltering | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When the sun falters and the seas disperse, when the wilds wither and the forges go cold, when death itself succumbs, she endures.
trans-unit.target: 眼下，太阳凋零，海水退散，猎野枯朽，熔锻渐寒，死亡步趋，而她仍守念如初。

trans-unit.target: 「哥哥，请指引我的右手。姐姐，请指引我的左手。各位亲人，请先安息，但洛温还需要我。我还不能马上与你们团聚。」

trans-unit.source: You and permanents you control gain hexproof until end of turn. Prevent all damage that black and/or red sources would deal to creatures you control this turn.
trans-unit.target: 你和由你操控的永久物获得辟邪异能直到回合结束。于本回合中，防止黑色和／或红色来源将对由你操控之生物造成的所有伤害。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·41 | Surge of Salvation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: No Meletian had ever laid eyes on an angel, but when protective Halo flooded the Multiverse, they knew a divine blessing was at hand.
trans-unit.target: 虽然迈勒提斯人从未见过天使，但当保护性金圆浪潮充盈整个多重宇宙时，他们也知道神圣祝福就在身旁。

trans-unit.target: 剑誓骑兵

trans-unit.resname: MOM·42 | Swordsworn Cavalier | Card Text

trans-unit.target: 只要本回合中有另一个骑士在你的操控下进战场，剑誓骑兵便具有先攻异能。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·42 | Swordsworn Cavalier | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Royal Knights of Belenon are equally practiced in courtesy and combat.

trans-unit.resname: MOM·43 | Tarkir Duneshaper | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Obey the teachings of the dragonlords, for they provide all. They grant us magic and safety, and in return we offer respect."\n—Baihir, Dromoka mage
trans-unit.target: 「吾人应当谨遵龙王教诲，因龙王便是我们世界的一切。他们许吾辈以魔法与安全，而我们还他们以敬意与尊重。」 ～卓茉卡族法师拜席尔

trans-unit.resname: MOM·43 | Burnished Dunestomper | Card Name

trans-unit.source: Trample
trans-unit.target: 践踏

trans-unit.resname: MOM·43 | Burnished Dunestomper | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Your precious dragonlords repressed your instincts, cur. You were born a hunter. Evolve, and hunt again."\n—Benzir, archdruid of Temple Might
trans-unit.target: 「你们所谓的尊贵龙王不过是在压制你们的本能，杂种。你们生来就是猎手。进化吧，而后再度开始狩猎。」 ～力量神殿高位德鲁伊班极

trans-unit.resname: MOM·45 | Zhalfirin Lancer | Flavor Text

trans-unit.source: No professors, no grades, no room for mistakes.
trans-unit.target: 不涉教授，不评成绩，不容有失。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·62 | Invasion of Kamigawa | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Invasion of Kamigawa
trans-unit.target: 进军神河

trans-unit.resname: MOM·62 | Invasion of Kamigawa | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) When Invasion of Kamigawa enters the battlefield, tap target artifact or creature an opponent controls and put a stun counter on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)
trans-unit.target: (于围攻进战场时，选择一位对手来防卫之。你和其他牌手能攻击围攻。当围攻失守时，将它放逐，然后你施放已转化的此牌。） 当进军神河进战场时，横置目标由对手操控的神器或生物并在其上放置一个晕眩指示物。（如果某个其上有晕眩指示物的永久物将成为未横置，则改为从其上移去一个晕眩指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·62 | Rooftop Saboteurs | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rooftop Saboteurs
trans-unit.target: 屋顶破坏者

trans-unit.resname: MOM·62 | Rooftop Saboteurs | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying Whenever Rooftop Saboteurs deals combat damage to a player or battle, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当屋顶破坏者对任一牌手或战役造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·62 | Rooftop Saboteurs | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The pace of Kamigawa's development meant that Jin-Gitaxias's intel was already outdated when the invaders arrived.
trans-unit.target: 神河方方面面都进步神速；这意味着当侵攻者降临时，金吉塔厦带回的情报就已经过时。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·63 | Invasion of Segovia | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Invasion of Segovia
trans-unit.target: 进军塞哥维亚

trans-unit.resname: MOM·63 | Invasion of Segovia | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) When Invasion of Segovia enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 blue Kraken creature tokens with trample.
trans-unit.target: (于围攻进战场时，选择一位对手来防卫之。你和其他牌手能攻击围攻。当围攻失守时，将它放逐，然后你施放已转化的此牌。） 当进军塞哥维亚进战场时，派出两个1/1蓝色，具践踏异能的巨海兽衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·63 | Caetus, Sea Tyrant of Segovia | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Caetus, Sea Tyrant of Segovia
trans-unit.target: 塞哥维亚海暴君凯特斯

trans-unit.resname: MOM·63 | Caetus, Sea Tyrant of Segovia | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Noncreature spells you cast have convoke. (Your creatures can help cast those spells. Each creature you tap while casting a noncreature spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) At the beginning of your end step, untap up to four target creatures.
trans-unit.target: 你施放的非生物咒语具有召集异能。（这些咒语能用你的生物来协助施放。你于施放非生物咒语时每横置一个生物，就能为此咒语支付{1}或一点该生物颜色之法术力。） 在你的结束步骤开始时，重置至多四个目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·64 | Invasion of Vryn | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Invasion of Vryn
trans-unit.target: 进军维林

trans-unit.resname: MOM·64 | Invasion of Vryn | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) When Invasion of Vryn enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: (于围攻进战场时，选择一位对手来防卫之。你和其他牌手能攻击围攻。当围攻失守时，将它放逐，然后你施放已转化的此牌。） 当进军维林进战场时，抓三张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·64 | Overloaded Mage-Ring | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Overloaded Mage-Ring
trans-unit.target: 过负载法师环塔

trans-unit.resname: MOM·64 | Overloaded Mage-Ring | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Overloaded Mage-Ring: Copy target spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}，牺牲过负载法师环塔：复制目标由你操控的咒语。（永久物咒语的复制品会成为衍生物。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·64 | Overloaded Mage-Ring | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "On my signal, disable the safeguards. Let's blow these metal freaks right back to their own world!"\n—Gav Beleren, mage-ring engineer
trans-unit.target: 「我一发号，就关掉所有保险。把这些金属怪物都炸回他们老家！」 ～法师环塔工程师加夫贝连

trans-unit.resname: MOM·65 | Jin-Gitaxias | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jin-Gitaxias
trans-unit.target: 金吉塔厦

trans-unit.resname: MOM·65 | Jin-Gitaxias | Card Text
MOM·65 | The Great Synthesis | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Great Synthesis
trans-unit.target: 伟大合成

trans-unit.resname: MOM·65 | The Great Synthesis | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.) I — Draw cards equal to the number of cards in your hand. You have no maximum hand size for as long as you control The Great Synthesis. II — Return all non-Phyrexian creatures to their owners' hands. III — You may cast any number of spells from your hand without paying their mana costs. Exile The Great Synthesis, then return it to the battlefield (front face up).
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。） I — 抓等同于你手牌数量的牌。于你操控伟大合成的时段内，你的手牌数量没有上限。 II — 将所有不是非瑞人的生物移回其拥有者手上。 III — 你可以从你手上施放任意数量的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。放逐伟大合成，然后将它移回战场（移回时为正面朝上）。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·66 | Meeting of Minds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Meeting of Minds
trans-unit.target: 思绪聚合

trans-unit.resname: MOM·66 | Meeting of Minds | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
trans-unit.target: 召集（此咒语能用你的生物来协助施放。你于施放此咒语时每横置一个生物，就能为此咒语支付{1}或一点该生物颜色之法术力。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·66 | Meeting of Minds | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw two cards.
trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·66 | Meeting of Minds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If something seems impossible, you probably haven't tried asking for help."\n—Niambi, cleric of Dominaria
trans-unit.target: 「若有事看似不可能，你或未尝试求助。」 ～多明纳里亚僧侣妮安碧

trans-unit.resname: MOM·67 | Moment of Truth | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Moment of Truth
trans-unit.target: 真相时刻

trans-unit.resname: MOM·67 | Moment of Truth | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, one into your graveyard, and one on the bottom of your library.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的三张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，一张置入你的坟墓场，一张置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·67 | Moment of Truth | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: On the precipice of eternity, Elspeth made a choice. The fight would not end without her.
trans-unit.target: 在虚空边缘，艾紫培作了个决定。这场战斗要由她来终结。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·68 | Negate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Negate
trans-unit.target: 失效

trans-unit.resname: MOM·68 | Negate | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Counter target noncreature spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标非生物咒语。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·68 | Negate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Teferi gave them time. Karn gave them a chance. But it was Melira who paid the ultimate price to free Ajani from Phyrexia's grasp.
trans-unit.target: 泰菲力赢回时间。卡恩夺回机会。但还是梅梨莱付出了生命代价，才最终救回阿耶尼，令其摆脱非瑞克西亚魔爪。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·69 | Oculus Whelp | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Oculus Whelp
trans-unit.target: 复眼幼龙

trans-unit.resname: MOM·69 | Oculus Whelp | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MOM·69 | Oculus Whelp | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As long as you control a transformed permanent, Oculus Whelp has "When Oculus Whelp dies, draw a card."
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控已转化的永久物，复眼幼龙便具有「当复眼幼龙死去时，抓一张牌。」

trans-unit.resname: MOM·69 | Oculus Whelp | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Even before Phyrexia's forces arrived on Tarkir, Silumgar's draconic brood had a discerning eye for valuables.
trans-unit.target: 在非瑞克西亚势力降临鞑契之前，席穆嘉一脉龙群就已生出对财宝挑剔的眼神。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·70 | Omen Hawker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Omen Hawker
trans-unit.target: 预兆贩商

trans-unit.resname: MOM·70 | Omen Hawker | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}{U}. Spend this mana only to activate abilities.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}{U}。此法术力只能用来起动异能。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·70 | Omen Hawker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: After years of fabricating visions for naive customers of the Obscura, Stafano was flummoxed by the nightmarish scenes that played out unbidden in his mind's eye.
trans-unit.target: 斯塔法诺多年来都在为秘闻帮的无知客户编造视像，却因灵眼当中突现的噩梦景象困惑不已。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·71 | Oracle of Tragedy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Oracle of Tragedy
trans-unit.target: 悲剧先知

trans-unit.resname: MOM·71 | Oracle of Tragedy | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Oracle of Tragedy enters the battlefield or dies, choose one —
trans-unit.target: 当悲剧先知进战场或死去时，选择一项～

trans-unit.resname: MOM·71 | Oracle of Tragedy | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: •抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·71 | Oracle of Tragedy | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Shuffle up to four target cards with mana value 3 or greater from your graveyard into your library.
trans-unit.target: •将至多四张目标法术力值等于或大于3的牌从你的坟墓场洗入你牌库。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·72 | Order of the Mirror | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Order of the Mirror
trans-unit.target: 魔镜骑士团

trans-unit.resname: MOM·72 | Order of the Mirror | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {3}{PW}: Transform Order of the Mirror. Activate only as a sorcery. ({PW} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.)
trans-unit.target: {3}{WP}：转化魔镜骑士团。只能于法术时机起动。（{WP}可用{W}或2点生命来支付。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·72 | Order of the Mirror | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Magic Mirror of Vantress showed Catrina a twisted vision of black oil and bloody machines.
trans-unit.target: 在卡翠娜面前，凡翠丝堡魔镜映出一副满是漆黑油污与血腥机械的扭曲景象。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·72 | Order of the Alabaster Host | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Order of the Alabaster Host
trans-unit.target: 洁白兵团骑士团

trans-unit.resname: MOM·72 | Order of the Alabaster Host | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever Order of the Alabaster Host becomes blocked by a creature, that creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当洁白兵团骑士团被生物阻挡时，后者得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·72 | Order of the Alabaster Host | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Soon she understood that it was not the vision that had been twisted, but her own mind.
trans-unit.target: 她很快就明白过来：扭曲的并非镜中景象，而是其脑中思绪。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·73 | Preening Champion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Preening Champion
trans-unit.target: 彩羽斗士

trans-unit.resname: MOM·73 | Preening Champion | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MOM·73 | Preening Champion | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Preening Champion enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 blue and red Elemental creature token.
trans-unit.target: 当彩羽斗士进战场时，派出一个1/1，蓝红双色的元素衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·73 | Preening Champion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: On Kylem, the omens of impending invasion went largely unnoticed, drowned out by the everyday fanfare of Valor's Reach.
trans-unit.target: 关于侵攻大军即将降临的预兆虽已传至凯勒姆，但大多数人都未曾听闻，因为每日英勇巅竞技场的喧嚣早就淹没了四处的示警呼声。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·74 | Protocol Knight | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Protocol Knight
trans-unit.target: 守式骑士

trans-unit.resname: MOM·74 | Protocol Knight | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Protocol Knight enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. Put a stun counter on that creature if you control another Knight. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)
trans-unit.target: 当守式骑士进战场时，横置目标由对手操控的生物。如果你操控另一个骑士，则在该目标生物上放置一个晕眩指示物。（如果某个其上有晕眩指示物的永久物将成为未横置，则改为从其上移去一个晕眩指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·74 | Protocol Knight | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Ingress without proper writ of extraplanar intent? Unacceptable!"
trans-unit.target: 「没有取得正式外时空意向手令就擅自闯入？无法接受！」

trans-unit.resname: MOM·75 | Rona, Herald of Invasion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rona, Herald of Invasion
trans-unit.target: 进军传令罗娜

trans-unit.resname: MOM·75 | Rona, Herald of Invasion | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a legendary spell, untap Rona, Herald of Invasion. {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. {5}{PB}: Transform Rona. Activate only as a sorcery. ({PB} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放传奇咒语时，重置进军传令罗娜。 {T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。 {5}{BP}：转化罗娜。只能于法术时机起动。（{BP}可用{B}或2点生命来支付。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·75 | Rona, Tolarian Obliterator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rona, Tolarian Obliterator
trans-unit.target: 陶拉里亚抹煞兽罗娜

trans-unit.resname: MOM·75 | Rona, Tolarian Obliterator | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Trample Whenever a source deals damage to Rona, Tolarian Obliterator, that source's controller exiles a card from their hand at random. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield under your control. Otherwise, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 每当一个来源对陶拉里亚抹煞兽罗娜造成伤害时，该来源的操控者随机从其手上放逐一张牌。若它是地牌，则你可以将之在你的操控下放进战场。若否，则你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·75 | Rona, Tolarian Obliterator | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "At last, I am *compleat*."
trans-unit.target: 「终于，我也完化了。」

trans-unit.source: Saiba Cryptomancer
trans-unit.target: 赛博派守密术士

trans-unit.source: Flash
trans-unit.target: 闪现

trans-unit.resname: MOM·76 | Saiba Cryptomancer | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Backup 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. If that's another creature, it gains the following ability until end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: 后援1（当此生物进战场时，在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。若后者是另一个生物，则它获得下文之异能直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·76 | Saiba Cryptomancer | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Hexproof
trans-unit.target: 辟邪

trans-unit.resname: MOM·76 | Saiba Cryptomancer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Good luck getting through a class-seven proxy ward, creep."
trans-unit.target: 「这七级代理防护祝你破解顺利，杂碎。」

trans-unit.resname: MOM·77 | See Double | Card Name
trans-unit.source: See Double
trans-unit.target: 视影成双

trans-unit.resname: MOM·77 | See Double | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell can't be copied.
trans-unit.target: 此咒语不能被复制。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·77 | See Double | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Choose one. If an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard, you may choose both.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项。如果任一对手的坟墓场中有八张或更多牌，则你可以两项都选。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·77 | See Double | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Copy target spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)
trans-unit.target: •复制目标咒语。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。（永久物咒语的复制品会成为衍生物。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·77 | See Double | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: • Create a token that's a copy of target creature.
trans-unit.target: •派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为目标生物之复制品。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·78 | Skyclave Aerialist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Skyclave Aerialist
trans-unit.target: 空境飞天客

trans-unit.resname: MOM·78 | Skyclave Aerialist | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying {4}{PG}: Transform Skyclave Aerialist. Activate only as a sorcery. ({PG} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {4}{GP}：转化空境飞天客。只能于法术时机起动。（{GP}可用{G}或2点生命来支付。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·78 | Skyclave Aerialist | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Together with her beloved falcon, she had explored every waterway on Zendikar, from the Tazeem highlands to the inland sea.
trans-unit.target: 她与心爱的猎隼一道，早已探遍赞迪卡的每处水道，到访上及塔晋高地，下至内陆汪洋的各个角落。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·78 | Skyclave Invader | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Skyclave Invader
trans-unit.target: 空境入侵客

trans-unit.resname: MOM·78 | Skyclave Invader | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying When this creature transforms into Skyclave Invader, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield. If you don't put the card onto the battlefield, put it into your hand.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当此生物转化为空境入侵客时，检视你的牌库顶牌。若它是地牌，则你可以将之放进战场。若你未将该牌放进战场，则将它置于你手上。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·78 | Skyclave Invader | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: With her guidance, the oil coursed freely across the world.
trans-unit.target: 在她的指引下，烁油方能奔流不息地流经整个世界。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·79 | Stasis Field | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stasis Field
trans-unit.target: 静态力场

trans-unit.resname: MOM·79 | Stasis Field | Card Text: Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 结附于生物

trans-unit.resname: MOM·79 | Stasis Field | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 0/2, has defender, and loses all other abilities.
trans-unit.target: 所结附的生物之基础力量与防御力为0/2，具有守军异能，且失去所有其他异能。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·79 | Stasis Field | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Old glitches in mage-ring function became critical tools in Vryn's defense.
trans-unit.target: 法师环塔的陈年故障，成了维林防线上的重要工具。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·80 | Temporal Cleansing | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Temporal Cleansing
trans-unit.target: 时间涤净

trans-unit.resname: MOM·80 | Temporal Cleansing | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
trans-unit.target: 召集（此咒语能用你的生物来协助施放。你于施放此咒语时每横置一个生物，就能为此咒语支付{1}或一点该生物颜色之法术力。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·80 | Temporal Cleansing | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: The owner of target nonland permanent puts it into their library second from the top or on the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 目标非地永久物的拥有者将它置于其牌库顶数来第二张的位置或牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·80 | Temporal Cleansing | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Now's not a good time."
trans-unit.target: 「现在不是好时候。」

trans-unit.resname: MOM·81 | Thunderhead Squadron | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 延势，系命 每当破坏引擎波禄卡诺斯或另一个由你操控且非衍生物的多头龙死去时，派出一个3/3，绿白双色，具延势异能的非瑞人／多头龙衍生生物和一个3/3，绿白双色，具系命异能的非瑞人／多头龙衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·201 | Portent Tracker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Portent Tracker
trans-unit.target: 征兆追迹客

trans-unit.resname: MOM·201 | Portent Tracker | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Untap target land.
trans-unit.target: {T}：重置目标地。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·201 | Portent Tracker | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Choose target battle. If an opponent protects it, remove a defense counter from it. Otherwise, put a defense counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {T}：选择目标战役。如果任一对手防卫之，则从其上移去一个布防指示物。若否，则在其上放置一个布防指示物。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·201 | Portent Tracker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In the days before the invasion, the symbol of its perpetrator appeared in strange places all across the Multiverse.
trans-unit.target: 于侵攻前几天，进军者的符号就已在多重宇宙各处奇异地方出现。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·202 | Ravenous Sailback | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ravenous Sailback
trans-unit.target: 贪食帆背龙

trans-unit.resname: MOM·202 | Ravenous Sailback | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Ravenous Sailback enters the battlefield, choose one —
trans-unit.target: 当贪食帆背龙进战场时，选择一项～

trans-unit.resname: MOM·202 | Ravenous Sailback | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Ravenous Sailback gains haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: •贪食帆背龙获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·202 | Ravenous Sailback | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
trans-unit.target: •消灭目标神器或结界。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·202 | Ravenous Sailback | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Converter beasts were sent to ensnare as many of Ixalan's dinosaurs as possible. Many of them were converted themselves—into snacks.
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚人大举派遣易化兽去依夏兰捕捉恐龙。它们其中多数确实有了变化～自己变成了零食。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·203 | Sandstalker Moloch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sandstalker Moloch
trans-unit.target: 潜砂棘蜥

trans-unit.resname: MOM·203 | Sandstalker Moloch | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flash
trans-unit.target: 闪现

trans-unit.resname: MOM·203 | Sandstalker Moloch | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Sandstalker Moloch enters the battlefield, if an opponent cast a blue and/or black spell this turn, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a permanent card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 当潜砂棘蜥进战场时，若本回合中有对手施放过蓝色和／或黑色咒语，则检视你牌库顶的四张牌。你可以展示其中一张永久物牌并置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·204 | Seed of Hope | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Seed of Hope
trans-unit.target: 希望种子

trans-unit.resname: MOM·204 | Seed of Hope | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Mill two cards. You may put a permanent card from among the milled cards into your hand. You gain 2 life. (To mill two cards, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 磨两张牌。你可以将一张永久物牌从所磨掉之牌中置于你手上。你获得2点生命。（磨两张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的两张牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·204 | Seed of Hope | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Wrenn had given everything and asked for nothing. She deserved a monument, but rest in a quiet meadow is all she would've wanted.
trans-unit.target: 芮恩付出了一切，却未求丝毫回报。她虽配得上一座纪念碑，但安息在宁静牧草地中或才是她所希冀的归宿。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·205 | Serpent-Blade Assailant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Serpent-Blade Assailant
trans-unit.target: 蛇刃袭击兵

trans-unit.resname: MOM·205 | Serpent-Blade Assailant | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Backup 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. If that's another creature, it gains the following ability until end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: 后援1（当此生物进战场时，在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。若后者是另一个生物，则它获得下文之异能直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·205 | Serpent-Blade Assailant | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch
trans-unit.target: 死触

trans-unit.resname: MOM·205 | Serpent-Blade Assailant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Kaldheim's cosmos was never yours to corrupt."
trans-unit.target: 「凯德海姆的寰宇永远轮不到你来腐化。」

trans-unit.resname: MOM·206 | Storm the Seedcore | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Storm the Seedcore
trans-unit.target: 突袭树种核心

trans-unit.resname: MOM·206 | Storm the Seedcore | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Distribute four +1/+1 counters among up to four target creatures you control. Creatures you control gain vigilance and trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 将四个+1/+1指示物分配给至多四个目标由你操控的生物。由你操控的生物获得警戒与践踏异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·206 | Storm the Seedcore | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In that moment, the fate of countless worlds rested with one dryad and a handful of the bravest Mirrodin had to offer.
trans-unit.target: 那一刻，无数世界的命运就掌握在一个树灵和一群最英勇的秘罗人手中。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·207 | Streetwise Negotiator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Streetwise Negotiator
trans-unit.target: 街头谈判员

trans-unit.resname: MOM·207 | Streetwise Negotiator | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Backup 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. If that's another creature, it gains the following ability until end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: 后援1（当此生物进战场时，在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。若后者是另一个生物，则它获得下文之异能直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·207 | Streetwise Negotiator | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: This creature assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.
trans-unit.target: 此生物依照其防御力来分配战斗伤害，而不是依照力量。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·207 | Streetwise Negotiator | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Like the laws, the rules of engagement always seem to bend in the Brokers' favor.
trans-unit.target: 交战规则跟法律一样，永远偏向扶济社。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·208 | Tandem Takedown | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tandem Takedown
trans-unit.target: 协力放倒

trans-unit.resname: MOM·208 | Tandem Takedown | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Up to two target creatures you control each get +1/+0 until end of turn. They each deal damage equal to their power to another target creature, planeswalker, or battle.
trans-unit.target: 至多两个目标由你操控的生物各得+1/+0直到回合结束。它们各依其力量对另一个目标生物，鹏洛客或战役造成伤害。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·208 | Tandem Takedown | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I take no pleasure in this, but Vadrok might."\n—Vivien Reid, to Lukka
trans-unit.target: 「我并不觉得这样有趣，但瓦卓克可能会乐在其中。」 ～薇薇安瑞德警告卢卡

trans-unit.target: 当缠结天际线进战场时，你获得5点生命且抚育5。（派出一个上面有五个+1/+1指示物的抚育器衍生物，且具有「{2}：转化此神器。」它转化为0/0非瑞人神器生物。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·209 | Tangled Skyline | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.source: Reach, trample
trans-unit.target: 延势，践踏

trans-unit.resname: MOM·210 | Timberland Ancient | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
trans-unit.target: 循环树林{2}（{2}，弃掉此牌：从你牌库中搜寻一张树林牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·210 | Timberland Ancient | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Only the trees were old enough to remember what happened when Moag ignored warnings of Phyrexia millennia ago. They were determined not to repeat the mistake.
trans-unit.target: 只有此处的古老树木，才记得千年以前墨格忽略非瑞克西亚警告时发生的悲剧。它们决心不再重蹈覆辙。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·211 | Tribute to the World Tree | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tribute to the World Tree
trans-unit.target: 永志世界树

trans-unit.resname: MOM·211 | Tribute to the World Tree | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card if its power is 3 or greater. Otherwise, put two +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，如果其力量等于或大于3，则抓一张牌。若否，则在其上放置两个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·211 | Tribute to the World Tree | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Tree was the heart of our world. It made me what I am and pulled me back from the brink of death. I won't allow it to be forgotten."\n—Esika, god of the Tree
trans-unit.target: 「这棵树是我们世界的核心。是它成就了我，是它将我从死亡边缘拉回。我绝不会让它被人遗忘。」 ～世界树神埃西卡

trans-unit.target: 寻仇大地

trans-unit.source: Target creature or land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with haste in addition to its other types until end of turn. It must be blocked this turn if able.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标由你操控的生物或地成为4/4，具敏捷异能的元素生物，且仍具有原本类别。它本回合若能被阻挡，则须如此作。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·212 | Vengeant Earth | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When Zendikar's defenders faltered, the Roil rose up to shake the invaders from its back.
trans-unit.target: 当赞迪卡守军败退之际，狂搅挺身而起将侵攻者抖落在地。

trans-unit.source: Trample, reach When Vorinclex enters the battlefield, search your library for up to two Forest cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle. {6}{G}{G}: Exile Vorinclex, then return it to the battlefield transformed under its owner's control. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: 践踏，延势 当弗霖凯进战场时，从你牌库中搜寻至多两张树林牌，展示这些牌，将它们置于你手上，然后洗牌。 {6}{G}{G}：放逐弗霖凯，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场且已转化。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.source: The Grand Evolution
trans-unit.target: 大进化

trans-unit.resname: MOM·213 | The Grand Evolution | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.) I — Mill ten cards. Put up to two creature cards from among the milled cards onto the battlefield. II — Distribute seven +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures you control. III — Until end of turn, creatures you control gain "{1}: This creature fights target creature you don't control." Exile The Grand Evolution, then return it to the battlefield (front face up).
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。） I — 磨十张牌。将至多两张生物牌从所磨掉之牌中放进战场。 II — 将七个+1/+1指示物分配给任意数量之目标由你操控的生物。 III — 直到回合结束，由你操控的生物获得「{1}：此生物与目标不由你操控的生物互斗。」放逐大进化，然后将它移回战场（移回时为正面朝上）。

trans-unit.source: War Historian
trans-unit.target: 战事史家

trans-unit.target: 延势

trans-unit.resname: MOM·214 | War Historian | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: War Historian has indestructible as long as it attacked a battle this turn.
trans-unit.target: 只要战事史家本回合中攻击过任一战役，它便具有不灭异能。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·214 | War Historian | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: All children on Kamigawa learn of the Kami War. Hostilities with beings from another reality were understood, and no time was wasted in disbelief.
trans-unit.target: 神河所有孩童都会学习逆神之战。他们都理解该对另一世界的来客多加提防，且不应将时间浪费在猜忌怀疑上面。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·215 | Wary Thespian | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 谨慎的演员

trans-unit.resname: MOM·215 | Wary Thespian | Card Text

trans-unit.target: 当谨慎的演员进战场或死去时，刺探1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·215 | Wary Thespian | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Cabaretti performance had veered off-script ... so how were the acrobats still moving in perfect unison?
trans-unit.target: 乐舞会的表演已经逐渐脱离剧本…但为什么他们的杂技演员动作还如此一致？

trans-unit.resname: MOM·216 | Wildwood Escort | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 幻野林卫士

trans-unit.resname: MOM·216 | Wildwood Escort | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Wildwood Escort enters the battlefield, return target creature or battle card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 当幻野林卫士进战场时，将目标生物或战役牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·216 | Wildwood Escort | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If Wildwood Escort would die, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果幻野林卫士将死去，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·216 | Wildwood Escort | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: With Eldraine's human knights called away to defend the courts, lost travelers were surprised to find themselves whisked to safety by the secretive folk of the wilds.
trans-unit.target: 虽然艾卓的人类骑士都被召回以保卫宫殿，但迷途幻野的旅人讶异地发现此处也有神秘人物会迅速将其带离险境。

trans-unit.target: 由你操控的地具有「{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。」

trans-unit.resname: MOM·217 | Wrenn and Realmbreaker | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: +1: Up to one target land you control becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature with vigilance, hexproof, and haste until your next turn. It's still a land.
trans-unit.target: +1：至多一个目标由你操控的地成为3/3，具警戒、辟邪与敏捷异能的元素生物直到你的下一个回合。它仍然是地。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·217 | Wrenn and Realmbreaker | Card Text: Paragraph 3

trans-unit.resname: MOM·217 | Wrenn and Realmbreaker | Card Text: Paragraph 4

trans-unit.target: −7：你获得具有以下异能的徽记～「你可以从你的坟墓场中使用地和施放永久物咒语。」

trans-unit.resname: MOM·218 | Baral and Kari Zev | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Baral and Kari Zev
trans-unit.target: 巴罗与卡丽泽夫

trans-unit.resname: MOM·218 | Baral and Kari Zev | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: First strike, menace
trans-unit.target: 先攻，威慑

trans-unit.resname: MOM·218 | Baral and Kari Zev | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast your first instant or sorcery spell each turn, you may cast a spell with lesser mana value that shares a card type with it from your hand without paying its mana cost. If you don't, create First Mate Ragavan, a legendary 2/1 red Monkey Pirate creature token. It gains haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放每回合中你的第一个瞬间或法术咒语时，你可以从你手上施放一个法术力值比它小、又与之具共通牌张类别的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。若你未如此作，则派出传奇衍生生物勒格文大副，其为2/1红色的猴／海盗。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·219 | Borborygmos and Fblthp | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Borborygmos and Fblthp
trans-unit.target: 咕噜力莫与夫毕佐

trans-unit.resname: MOM·219 | Borborygmos and Fblthp | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever Borborygmos and Fblthp enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card, then you may discard any number of land cards. When you discard one or more cards this way, Borborygmos and Fblthp deals twice that much damage to target creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当咕噜力莫与夫毕佐进战场或攻击时，抓一张牌，然后你可以弃任意数量的地牌。每当你以此法弃一张或数张牌时，咕噜力莫与夫毕佐对目标生物造成该数量两倍的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·219 | Borborygmos and Fblthp | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{U}: Put Borborygmos and Fblthp into its owner's library third from the top.
trans-unit.target: {1}{U}：将咕噜力莫与夫毕佐置于其拥有者的牌库顶数来第三张的位置。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·220 | Botanical Brawler | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 践踏

trans-unit.source: Botanical Brawler enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: 植生好斗者进战场时上面有两个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·220 | Botanical Brawler | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on another permanent you control, if it's the first time +1/+1 counters have been put on that permanent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Botanical Brawler.
trans-unit.target: 每当在另一个由你操控的永久物上放置一个或数个+1/+1指示物时，若这是本回合中第一次在该永久物上放置+1/+1指示物，则在植生好斗者上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·221 | Djeru and Hazoret | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Djeru and Hazoret

trans-unit.resname: MOM·221 | Djeru and Hazoret | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as you have one or fewer cards in hand, Djeru and Hazoret has vigilance and haste.
trans-unit.target: 只要你的手牌为一张或更少，杰鲁与哈佐蕾便具有警戒与敏捷异能。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·221 | Djeru and Hazoret | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Djeru and Hazoret attacks, look at the top six cards of your library. You may exile a legendary creature card from among them. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Until end of turn, you may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost.

trans-unit.source: "I've heard much about you from my daughter," Multani rumbled. "There was a time when I'd balk at your aid, phantom, but she has shown me the merit in Urborg's strange ways."\n"Gnshhagghkkapphribbit," replied Yargle.
trans-unit.target: 「我经常听我女儿说起你，」穆塔尼低声道。「幽魅怪蛙，要是以前，我一定会对你的好意嗤之以鼻，但我女儿用乌尔博格的奇异方式让我看到了此间裨益。」 「咕唰嘎咔呸呱，」雅骨尔应道。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·257 | Zimone and Dina | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Zimone and Dina
trans-unit.target: 琦梦与迪娜

trans-unit.resname: MOM·257 | Zimone and Dina | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当你抓每回合中你的第二张牌时，目标对手失去2点生命且你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·257 | Zimone and Dina | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped. If you control eight or more lands, repeat this process once.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲另一个生物：抓一张牌。你可以将一张地牌从你手上横置放进战场。如果你操控八个或更多地，则将此流程再重复一次。

trans-unit.target: 只要珠高与欧祝泰是于本回合进战场，它便具有辟邪异能。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·258 | Zurgo and Ojutai | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more Dragons you control deal combat damage to a player or battle, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. You may return one of those Dragons to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当由你操控的一个或数个龙对任一牌手或战役造成战斗伤害时，检视你牌库顶的三张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余则以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。你可以将这些龙之一移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "Just like dodging stampedes in the Makindi Trenches back home!"

trans-unit.target: 当掠行勘探械进战场时，你可以从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·264 | Skittering Surveyor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Though no bigger than a hand, the surveyors were as vital to the resistance as the largest war constructs.
trans-unit.target: 虽然勘探械还没有手掌大，但在志士眼中，它们的作用并不亚于最大型的战争机械。

trans-unit.target: 每当佩带此武具的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，刺探2。然后你可以从你坟墓场中施放一个法术力值等于或小于2的瞬间或法术咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。如果该咒语将进入你的坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。

MOM·292 | Elesh Norn | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Elesh Norn
trans-unit.target: 艾蕾侬

trans-unit.resname: MOM·292 | Elesh Norn | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Vigilance Whenever a source an opponent controls deals damage to you or a permanent you control, that source's controller loses 2 life unless they pay {1}. {2}{W}, Sacrifice three other creatures: Exile Elesh Norn, then return it to the battlefield transformed under its owner's control. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 每当一个由对手操控的来源对你或任一由你操控的永久物造成伤害时，除非该来源的操控者支付{1}，否则其失去2点生命。 {2}{W}，牺牲三个其他生物：放逐艾蕾侬，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场且已转化。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·292 | The Argent Etchings | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Argent Etchings
trans-unit.target: 银蚀圣典

trans-unit.resname: MOM·292 | The Argent Etchings | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.) I — Incubate 2 five times, then transform all Incubator tokens you control. II — Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain double strike until end of turn. III — Destroy all other permanents except for artifacts, lands, and Phyrexians. Exile The Argent Etchings, then return it to the battlefield (front face up).
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。） I — 抚育2五次，然后转化所有由你操控的抚育器衍生物。 II — 直到回合结束，由你操控的生物得+1/+1且获得连击异能。 III — 消灭所有其他永久物，但神器、地和非瑞人除外。放逐银蚀圣典，然后将它移回战场（移回时为正面朝上）。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·293 | Heliod, the Radiant Dawn | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Heliod, the Radiant Dawn
trans-unit.target: 曙光耀辉赫利欧德

trans-unit.resname: MOM·293 | Heliod, the Radiant Dawn | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Heliod, the Radiant Dawn enters the battlefield, return target enchantment card that isn't a God from your graveyard to your hand. {3}{PU}: Transform Heliod, the Radiant Dawn. Activate only as a sorcery. ({PU} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
trans-unit.target: 当曙光耀辉赫利欧德进战场时，将目标不是神的结界牌从你坟墓场移回你手上。 {3}{UP}：转化曙光耀辉赫利欧德。只能于法术时机起动。（{UP}可用{U}或2点生命来支付。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·293 | Heliod, the Warped Eclipse | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Heliod, the Warped Eclipse
trans-unit.target: 扭曲日蚀赫利欧德

trans-unit.resname: MOM·293 | Heliod, the Warped Eclipse | Card Text
trans-unit.source: You may cast spells as though they had flash. Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each card your opponents have drawn this turn.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将咒语视同具有闪现异能地来施放。 所有对手本回合中每抓过一张牌，你施放的咒语便减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·294 | Jin-Gitaxias | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jin-Gitaxias
trans-unit.target: 金吉塔厦

trans-unit.resname: MOM·294 | Jin-Gitaxias | Card Text
MOM·294 | The Great Synthesis | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Great Synthesis
trans-unit.target: 伟大合成

trans-unit.resname: MOM·294 | The Great Synthesis | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.) I — Draw cards equal to the number of cards in your hand. You have no maximum hand size for as long as you control The Great Synthesis. II — Return all non-Phyrexian creatures to their owners' hands. III — You may cast any number of spells from your hand without paying their mana costs. Exile The Great Synthesis, then return it to the battlefield (front face up).
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。） I — 抓等同于你手牌数量的牌。于你操控伟大合成的时段内，你的手牌数量没有上限。 II — 将所有不是非瑞人的生物移回其拥有者手上。 III — 你可以从你手上施放任意数量的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。放逐伟大合成，然后将它移回战场（移回时为正面朝上）。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·295 | Rona, Herald of Invasion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rona, Herald of Invasion
trans-unit.target: 进军传令罗娜

trans-unit.resname: MOM·295 | Rona, Herald of Invasion | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a legendary spell, untap Rona, Herald of Invasion. {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. {5}{PB}: Transform Rona. Activate only as a sorcery. ({PB} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放传奇咒语时，重置进军传令罗娜。 {T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。 {5}{BP}：转化罗娜。只能于法术时机起动。（{BP}可用{B}或2点生命来支付。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·295 | Rona, Tolarian Obliterator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rona, Tolarian Obliterator
trans-unit.target: 陶拉里亚抹煞兽罗娜

trans-unit.resname: MOM·295 | Rona, Tolarian Obliterator | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Trample Whenever a source deals damage to Rona, Tolarian Obliterator, that source's controller exiles a card from their hand at random. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield under your control. Otherwise, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 每当一个来源对陶拉里亚抹煞兽罗娜造成伤害时，该来源的操控者随机从其手上放逐一张牌。若它是地牌，则你可以将之在你的操控下放进战场。若否，则你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·296 | Ayara, Widow of the Realm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ayara, Widow of the Realm
trans-unit.target: 世境寡人阿娅拉

trans-unit.resname: MOM·296 | Ayara, Widow of the Realm | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice another creature or artifact: Ayara, Widow of the Realm deals X damage to target opponent or battle and you gain X life, where X is the sacrificed permanent's mana value. {5}{PR}: Transform Ayara. Activate only as a sorcery. ({PR} can be paid with either {R} or 2 life.)
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲另一个生物或神器：世境寡人阿娅拉向目标对手或战役造成X点伤害且你获得X点生命，X为所牺牲永久物的法术力值。 {5}{RP}：转化阿娅拉。只能于法术时机起动。（{RP}可用{R}或2点生命来支付。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·296 | Ayara, Furnace Queen | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ayara, Furnace Queen
trans-unit.target: 熔炉女王阿娅拉

trans-unit.resname: MOM·296 | Ayara, Furnace Queen | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, return up to one target artifact or creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，将至多一张目标神器或生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·297 | Sheoldred | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sheoldred

trans-unit.resname: MOM·297 | Sheoldred | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Menace When Sheoldred enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a nontoken creature or planeswalker. {4}{B}: Exile Sheoldred, then return it to the battlefield transformed under its owner's control. Activate only as a sorcery and only if an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 威慑 当希欧蕊进战场时，每位对手各牺牲一个非衍生物的生物或鹏洛客。 {4}{B}：放逐希欧蕊，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场且已转化。只能于法术时机起动，且仅限任一对手的坟墓场中有八张或更多牌时。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·297 | The True Scriptures | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The True Scriptures
trans-unit.target: 化真经文

trans-unit.resname: MOM·297 | The True Scriptures | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.) I — For each opponent, destroy up to one target creature or planeswalker that player controls. II — Each opponent discards three cards, then mills three cards. III — Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control. Exile The True Scriptures, then return it to the battlefield (front face up).
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。） I — 为每位对手各进行以下流程～消灭至多一个目标由该牌手操控的生物或鹏洛客。 II — 每位对手各弃三张牌，然后各磨三张牌。 III — 将所有坟墓场中的所有生物牌在你的操控下放进战场。放逐化真经文，然后将它移回战场（移回时为正面朝上）。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·298 | Etali, Primal Conqueror | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Etali, Primal Conqueror
trans-unit.target: 始霸埃泰力

trans-unit.resname: MOM·298 | Etali, Primal Conqueror | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Trample When Etali, Primal Conqueror enters the battlefield, each player exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card. You may cast any number of spells from among the nonland cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs. {9}{PG}: Transform Etali. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 当始霸埃泰力进战场时，每位牌手各从其牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张非地牌为止。你可以从以此法放逐的非地牌之中施放任意数量的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。 {9}{GP}：转化始霸埃泰力。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.source: Trample, indestructible Whenever Etali, Primal Sickness deals combat damage to a player, they get that many poison counters.
trans-unit.target: 践踏，不灭 每当始病埃泰力对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手得到等量的中毒指示物。

trans-unit.source: Urabrask

trans-unit.resname: MOM·299 | Urabrask | Card Text
trans-unit.source: First strike Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Urabrask deals 1 damage to target opponent. Add {R}. {R}: Exile Urabrask, then return it to the battlefield transformed under its owner's control. Activate only as a sorcery and only if you've cast three or more instant and/or sorcery spells this turn.
trans-unit.target: 先攻 每当你施放瞬间或法术咒语时，洼巴司向目标对手造成1点伤害。加{R}。 {R}：放逐洼巴司，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场且已转化。只能于法术时机起动，且仅限你施放过三个或更多瞬间和／或法术咒语的回合。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·299 | The Great Work | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Great Work
trans-unit.target: 伟大志业

trans-unit.resname: MOM·299 | The Great Work | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.) I — The Great Work deals 3 damage to target opponent and each creature they control. II — Create three Treasure tokens. III — Until end of turn, you may cast instant and sorcery spells from any graveyard. If a spell cast this way would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead. Exile The Great Work, then return it to the battlefield (front face up).
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。） I — 伟大志业向目标对手和每个由其操控的生物各造成3点伤害。 II — 派出三个珍宝衍生物。 III — 直到回合结束，你可以从任意坟墓场中施放瞬间和法术咒语。若以此法施放的咒语将进入坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。放逐伟大志业，然后将它移回战场（移回时为正面朝上）。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·300 | Polukranos Reborn | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: MOM·300 | Polukranos Reborn | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Reach {6}{PW}: Transform Polukranos Reborn. Activate only as a sorcery. ({PW} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.)
trans-unit.target: 延势 {6}{WP}：转化返生的波禄卡诺斯。只能于法术时机起动。（{WP}可用{W}或2点生命来支付。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·300 | Polukranos, Engine of Ruin | Card Name

trans-unit.source: Reach, lifelink Whenever Polukranos, Engine of Ruin or another nontoken Hydra you control dies, create a 3/3 green and white Phyrexian Hydra creature token with reach and a 3/3 green and white Phyrexian Hydra creature token with lifelink.
trans-unit.target: 延势，系命 每当破坏引擎波禄卡诺斯或另一个由你操控且非衍生物的多头龙死去时，派出一个3/3，绿白双色，具延势异能的非瑞人／多头龙衍生生物和一个3/3，绿白双色，具系命异能的非瑞人／多头龙衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·301 | Vorinclex | Card Name

trans-unit.source: Trample, reach When Vorinclex enters the battlefield, search your library for up to two Forest cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle. {6}{G}{G}: Exile Vorinclex, then return it to the battlefield transformed under its owner's control. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: 践踏，延势 当弗霖凯进战场时，从你牌库中搜寻至多两张树林牌，展示这些牌，将它们置于你手上，然后洗牌。 {6}{G}{G}：放逐弗霖凯，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场且已转化。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·301 | The Grand Evolution | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Grand Evolution
trans-unit.target: 大进化

trans-unit.resname: MOM·301 | The Grand Evolution | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.) I — Mill ten cards. Put up to two creature cards from among the milled cards onto the battlefield. II — Distribute seven +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures you control. III — Until end of turn, creatures you control gain "{1}: This creature fights target creature you don't control." Exile The Grand Evolution, then return it to the battlefield (front face up).
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。） I — 磨十张牌。将至多两张生物牌从所磨掉之牌中放进战场。 II — 将七个+1/+1指示物分配给任意数量之目标由你操控的生物。 III — 直到回合结束，由你操控的生物获得「{1}：此生物与目标不由你操控的生物互斗。」放逐大进化，然后将它移回战场（移回时为正面朝上）。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·302 | Baral and Kari Zev | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Baral and Kari Zev
trans-unit.target: 巴罗与卡丽泽夫

trans-unit.resname: MOM·302 | Baral and Kari Zev | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: First strike, menace
trans-unit.target: 先攻，威慑

trans-unit.resname: MOM·302 | Baral and Kari Zev | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast your first instant or sorcery spell each turn, you may cast a spell with lesser mana value that shares a card type with it from your hand without paying its mana cost. If you don't, create First Mate Ragavan, a legendary 2/1 red Monkey Pirate creature token. It gains haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放每回合中你的第一个瞬间或法术咒语时，你可以从你手上施放一个法术力值比它小、又与之具共通牌张类别的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。若你未如此作，则派出传奇衍生生物勒格文大副，其为2/1红色的猴／海盗。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·303 | Borborygmos and Fblthp | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Borborygmos and Fblthp
trans-unit.target: 咕噜力莫与夫毕佐

trans-unit.resname: MOM·303 | Borborygmos and Fblthp | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever Borborygmos and Fblthp enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card, then you may discard any number of land cards. When you discard one or more cards this way, Borborygmos and Fblthp deals twice that much damage to target creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当咕噜力莫与夫毕佐进战场或攻击时，抓一张牌，然后你可以弃任意数量的地牌。每当你以此法弃一张或数张牌时，咕噜力莫与夫毕佐对目标生物造成该数量两倍的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·303 | Borborygmos and Fblthp | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{U}: Put Borborygmos and Fblthp into its owner's library third from the top.
trans-unit.target: {1}{U}：将咕噜力莫与夫毕佐置于其拥有者的牌库顶数来第三张的位置。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·304 | Djeru and Hazoret | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Djeru and Hazoret
trans-unit.target: 杰鲁与哈佐蕾

trans-unit.resname: MOM·304 | Djeru and Hazoret | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as you have one or fewer cards in hand, Djeru and Hazoret has vigilance and haste.
trans-unit.target: 只要你的手牌为一张或更少，杰鲁与哈佐蕾便具有警戒与敏捷异能。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·304 | Djeru and Hazoret | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Djeru and Hazoret attacks, look at the top six cards of your library. You may exile a legendary creature card from among them. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Until end of turn, you may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 每当杰鲁与哈佐蕾攻击时，检视你牌库顶的六张牌。你可以放逐其中一张传奇生物牌。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。直到回合结束，你可以施放所放逐的牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: • Create a tapped and attacking X/X green Dinosaur creature token with trample, where X is the greatest power among other attacking creatures.

trans-unit.resname: MOM·317 | Yargle and Multani | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I've heard much about you from my daughter," Multani rumbled. "There was a time when I'd balk at your aid, phantom, but she has shown me the merit in Urborg's strange ways."\n"Gnshhagghkkapphribbit," replied Yargle.
trans-unit.target: 「我经常听我女儿说起你，」穆塔尼低声道。「幽魅怪蛙，要是以前，我一定会对你的好意嗤之以鼻，但我女儿用乌尔博格的奇异方式让我看到了此间裨益。」 「咕唰嘎咔呸呱，」雅骨尔应道。

trans-unit.source: Botanical Brawler
trans-unit.target: 植生好斗者

trans-unit.resname: MOM·384 | Botanical Brawler | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Trample
trans-unit.target: 践踏

trans-unit.resname: MOM·384 | Botanical Brawler | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Botanical Brawler enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: 植生好斗者进战场时上面有两个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·384 | Botanical Brawler | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on another permanent you control, if it's the first time +1/+1 counters have been put on that permanent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Botanical Brawler.
trans-unit.target: 每当在另一个由你操控的永久物上放置一个或数个+1/+1指示物时，若这是本回合中第一次在该永久物上放置+1/+1指示物，则在植生好斗者上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·385 | Halo Forager | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Halo Forager
trans-unit.target: 金圆搜集灵

trans-unit.resname: MOM·385 | Halo Forager | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MOM·385 | Halo Forager | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Halo Forager enters the battlefield, you may pay {X}. When you do, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with mana value X from a graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 当金圆搜集灵进战场时，你可以支付{X}。当你如此作时，你可以从任一坟墓场中施放目标法术力值为X的瞬间或法术牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。若该咒语将进入坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·386 | Ghalta and Mavren | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Trample Whenever you attack, choose one — • Create a tapped and attacking X/X green Dinosaur creature token with trample, where X is the greatest power among other attacking creatures. • Create X 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with lifelink, where X is the number of other attacking creatures.

trans-unit.resname: MOM·387 | Omnath, Locus of All | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Omnath, Locus of All
trans-unit.target: 万物核欧那斯

trans-unit.resname: MOM·387 | Omnath, Locus of All | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If you would lose unspent mana, that mana becomes black instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将失去未用尽的法术力，则改为该份法术力都成为黑色。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·387 | Omnath, Locus of All | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, look at the top card of your library. You may reveal that card if it has three or more colored mana symbols in its mana cost. If you do, add three mana in any combination of its colors and put it into your hand. If you don't reveal it, put it into your hand.
trans-unit.target: 在你战斗前的行动阶段开始时，检视你的牌库顶牌。如果该牌的法术力费用中包括三种或更多有色法术力符号，则你可以展示之。若你如此作，则加三点法术力到你的法术力池中，其颜色为该牌颜色的任意组合，并将该牌置于你手上。若你未展示之，则将它置于你手上。
